title: IP not updateding
body: My IP (influence point) is not increasing, it has been the same even after 4 games now

replies.body: Same here my ip is not updating help plz

EUW experienced some technical issues that prevented IP gains for matches. This issue has been resolved and you should see a credit for the missing IP. 

Let me know if you have any other issues with this.
I have same problem my IP not update and now 6 games I had IP Boosts and it time will finish my money will be no use for that I need replay ASAP PLS
Some problem support delete my post
